meanings.sent1: My nuncles always tell the best stories.
meanings.sent2: I have two nuncles who live in the countryside.
meanings.sent3: During family gatherings, my nuncles love to joke around.
meanings.sent4: To me, my nuncles are like wise old trees, providing shade and guidance.
meanings.sent5: The image of my nuncles laughing together is etched in my memory.

meanings.sent1: She invited all her nuncles to the birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The family reunion was filled with aunts and nuncles from all over.
meanings.sent3: The nuncles decided to surprise their nephew with a gift.
meanings.sent4: In that moment, the room felt full of nuncles, each with a unique story to share.
meanings.sent5: The photo album was a treasure trove of memories with nuncles from years past.
